pr_title: Change observe module functions used by ballerina/http to isolated

timeline.message:
Update observe lib module functions which are currently used by ballerina/http module to isolated

# Since all the functions in ballerina/http had been changed to "isolated", to support this, observe modules's functions that are currently used by ballerina/http had been changed to isolated. Ideally we should make all the function in observe lib isolated.

timeline.bodyText: do we need to change this to ConcurrentHashMap ?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText: Since this had not been an issue so far, I have reverted this change with 6294955. I will verify this further and add back the ConcurrentHashMaps later if needed.
replies.author: nadundesilva

timeline.message:
Revert added ConcurrentHashMaps

# Since ConcurrentHashMaps may introduce a perf hit and since we have no issues so far with HashMaps, we will revert this change. This needs to be tested and verified to see if it is thread safe or not.
